TopicTitle: X-Plane Lifting Body and B-52 carrier mod pack

Articles.Content: Can someone please make this for me? It will go a long way toward my upcoming first episode of my STS Recreation youtube series. The B-52 is not a requirement...or an exact replica (if it could be one, though, that would be FANTASTIC), but, at the very least, make the X-Planes...even the failed ones, realistic-looking! Thanks!
If this were to be made more interesting, it could be another opportunity for more science!
ok, I'm sad by the lack of interest in my challenge.

Here's a B-52. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105303-A-10-B-52-and-updated-F-15

And a B-52 with a X-15. http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/24ex98/b52_carrier_plane_and_x15_test_launch/

As to a X-15, you can build one in stock fairly easily, but it won't meet your requirement of realistic. And just a flying tip -- place a counterweight beneath the B-52's wing opposite the X-15. Provides balance. Drop both at the same time if you want to try and fly the B-52 after launching the X-15. If not, then go with a probe controlled B-52. No dead bomber flight crew that way.

And I did not make these. Just trying to help you out.

Fly straight and True.
